channel.title: Stupid question
channel.description: How do i send a message WITH color..i dont think its [code] sendMessage("@cya@blahblahblah"); [/code] is it? or is it [code] sendMessage("Cyan:blahblahblah"); [/code] or w/e..ive seen it before so i know its possible.

item.title: Stupid question
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

[quote=“masta XY, post:12, topic:252083”][quote author=xray veeo link=topic=332885.msg2595781#msg2595781 date=1229986656]

I’m pretty sure this is client-sided.

yea, i heard that…but how is the problem.

No, its the first one you use @color@ where it says color you put the first three letter’s of the color… So it would be like these.

@red@, @blu@, @yel@, @dbl@, @gre@, @ora@, etc…

Are sure?this Is For Sendmessages not Like In A quest Menu to Let you Know.

How about you test it instead of asking?

hmm…Because Unlike your noob server With 6 ppl for 12 hours, i got 54 people to dc just to test a color…
[/quote]

Sorry idiot, I dont have a server, if you want to keep mouthing me then why dont you come say it to my face, this is why i got a signature read it and maybe you will noticed that it is directed at you.[/quote]
woah calm down their tough guy, i don’t want you to “beat me up”…how the hell am i going to say it to your face…what do you want to make some kind of scene here asking for my adress like your actually going to find out where i live and come to my house, attempt to beat me up, because i said you had a noob server?seriously, shut the fuck up.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid question
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Actually, instead of doing everything I said, you can just edit the method so that if it starts with the @color@ prefix it changes the color.
That would actually take a lot less time and effort.

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid question
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

method77("test test test", 5, "", aBoolean991);

5 is the color right?
i think its red…but what do i put to make it so hwen i login it says shit in the red color or whatever?

Read full topic

item.title: Stupid question
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Edit packet 253 in the client so that you can send a byte that determines the color of the String.
In the client, the sendMessage method (method77) has to following parameters:

method77(String message, int color (I don't know the number for each color), String playerName (I think this affects the add friend or add ignore option when you right click the message, never tested), boolean sendMessage (If this is false, the message will not be sent))
You should give your client a specific UID so the server can distinguish it from other clients and only send this extra byte if they’re using this custom client.

Read full topic
